easyTerms.title: Easy Terms
easyTerms.description: The procedures for obtaining a Qard Hassan are often easier and faster than traditional loans, making it an attractive option for many.

noInterest.title: No Interest
noInterest.description: No interest or fees are charged, ensuring compliance with Islamic Sharia.

support247.title: 24/7 Technical Support
support247.description: Our team is ready to help you anytime. If you have any questions or issues, don't hesitate to contact us.

emergencySolution.title: Emergency Solution
emergencySolution.description: Sadaqa Jariya Waqf for Qard Hassan provides a quick and legitimate solution to financial problems that individuals and families may face, such as treatment or necessary home repairs.

loanFunding.subtitle: By integrating advanced technologies, Islamic finance is reshaping the financial landscape, making it more user-friendly and adaptable to modern needs.

createAccount.description: Create an account using your email address or social media profile. Quick and straightforward registration process.

trackTransactions.title: Track Your Transactions in Real-Time:

customerSupport.title: Access 24/7 Customer Support:
customerSupport.description: Get help anytime with our dedicated support team ready to assist with any issues or questions.

testimonial1.name: Fathi
testimonial1.text: I borrowed money and the steps were simple, fast, and without interest.

testimonial2.name: Ahmed
testimonial2.text: An excellent service that helped me in a difficult time.

testimonial3.name: Khaled
testimonial3.text: A smooth and Sharia-compliant experience. I highly recommend it.

testimonial4.name: Omar
testimonial4.text: Fast approval and no interest. The best lending experience I've had.

testimonial5.name: Youssef
testimonial5.text: The support team was very helpful throughout the entire process.

processingTime.question: How long does it take to process a financing request?
processingTime.answer: The financing request is processed within 24-48 hours of submitting all required documents.

signContract.question: How can I sign the financing contract and promissory notes?
signContract.answer: You can sign the contract electronically through the platform using the approved digital signature.

otherObligations.question: Can I get cash financing if I have other obligations?
otherObligations.answer: Yes, you can get financing provided that your monthly obligations do not exceed 50% of your monthly income.

newsletter.title: Follow the Latest
newsletter.subtitle: Join our newsletter to stay updated on features and releases.
newsletter.privacyNote: By subscribing, you agree to our service privacy policy.

footer.copyright: Copyright © 2025 Sadaqa Jariya Waqf for Qard Hassan. All rights reserved

feature.subtitle: Enhancing Financial Clarity
feature.title: Window of Hope
feature.description: Sadaqa Jariya Waqf reshapes the Qard Hassan lending landscape, making it an attractive option for many. By integrating advanced technologies, Islamic finance is reshaping the financial landscape to become more user-friendly and adaptable to modern needs.
additionalInfo: Sadaqa Jariya Waqf for Qard Hassan provides a quick and legitimate solution to financial problems such as treatment or necessary home repairs, with a team always ready to provide assistance and answer any questions or issues.

The loan is granted without any interest or fees, ensuring compliance with Islamic Sharia principles, and its procedures are characterized by ease and speed compared to traditional loans, making it an ideal choice for many.

vision.title: Our Vision
content: To be the leading and reference endowment for peers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia in the field of Qard Hassan and to be a model to be emulated in responsible financial empowerment, achieving sustainable development and enhancing social and economic impact.
To make a positive difference in the lives of individuals and families by providing good loans that help them achieve their goals and overcome financial challenges.

mission.title: Our Mission
content: Providing Qard Hassan services according to the highest standards of efficiency and transparency, with sustainable endowment mechanisms, and strategic partnerships with the public, private and non-profit sectors, contributing to improving quality of life.
Empowering beneficiaries to rely on themselves, and supporting social and economic innovation.
Promoting Islamic finance culture and raising awareness of the importance of good loans in achieving community development.

focusOnNeedy.title: Focus on the Most Needy Categories
focusOnNeedy.description: Expanding the scope of beneficiaries from Qard Hassan services, with a focus on the most needy categories.

strategicPartnerships.title: Building Strategic Partnerships
strategicPartnerships.description: Building strategic partnerships with government, private and non-profit entities to maximize impact.

enhanceSustainability.title: Enhancing Sustainability
enhanceSustainability.description: Enhancing the financial sustainability of the endowment by developing its resources and investments to ensure continued giving.

development.title: Development
development.description: Developing programs and initiatives that link Qard Hassan with economic and social development.

governancePrinciples.title: Establishing Governance Principles
governancePrinciples.description: Establishing governance, transparency and accountability principles in endowment management and programs.

capacityBuilding.title: Building Beneficiaries' Capacities
capacityBuilding.description: Building beneficiaries' capacities through financial education and non-financial support to enhance their success opportunities.

vision2030.description: Sadaqa Jariya Waqf for Qard Hassan contributes to achieving the Kingdom's Vision 2030 targets

benefits.financial: Financially empowering individuals and families to achieve self-sufficiency and reduce the need for traditional support.
benefits.economy: Supporting the national economy by financing micro-projects with a spirit of justice and benevolence.
benefits.sustainability: Contributing to the sustainability of the non-profit sector through an innovative endowment model that supports comprehensive development.
benefits.transformation: Alignment with national transformation programs aimed at improving quality of life and expanding opportunities for all.
benefits.opportunities: Creating sustainable opportunities for economic growth and social development.

vision2030.description: The Ongoing Charity Endowment for Qard Hasan contributes to supporting the goals of Saudi Vision 2030
